Patrick Kenslea, Massachusetts Division Account Manager

In 2011 Patrick Kenslea received his Bachelor’s Degree from the University of Colorado at Boulder with a double major in Psychology and Geography. After returning to the Boston area and working for Zipcar in Cambridge, he worked in special education for three years with Newton Public Schools. In 2014 he joined ClinLab Staffing as an entry level recruiter and quickly proved himself as the top recruiter in his group. With a passion for learning how things work and for helping others, recruiting was a natural fit for him. He is currently an Account Manager, with oversight of a recruiting team while also operating a full desk. He is a Massachusetts group leader, recruiting for R&D, Manufacturing, Quality and Operations.

Outside of the office, Patrick enjoys hiking in the mountains, snowboarding above the tree line, and August vacations in Maine with his 29 first cousins. He is the proud father of an energetic 6 year old daughter, Colby, who he occasionally admits is an Australian Shepherd.

Massachusetts Offices

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
